channel.title: Grand Scripting Utility
channel.description:
Try this Utility out. I'v set out to change the way we script! :P
Features
1. Displays Bitmaps bigger then 40x40
2. Integer to Color - Displays Color codes as Colors
3. Visually represents Radians
4. Changes Radians to Degrees and vice/versa
No more will you have to wonder when you see "if(getcolor(35,456)=45646)then" [IMG]http://img124.imageshack.us/img124/2695/colornq9.png[/img]
No longer will you ponder on "bmp:=bitmapfromstring(5,65,'sgd...)" [IMG]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/61/bmplo3.png[/img]
Radians made easy, pictures say a thousand words [IMG]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/5339/radianmb4.png[/img]
[B]Requirements:[/B] SCAR 2.03 and WinRar
Example for everything are already in the script, no confusing lables ;)
Even has some explanations (right at the bottom so you dont have to scroll down when using it :D )
Also iv added this video tutoral which explanes the 3 main functions of the script, however its quite big so i compressed it

item.title: Grand Scripting Utility
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

yes, i found out about scar on a site called rstools.prv.pl

about 9 months i was scripting with scar

i belived scar scripting to be dead for a long time, then i found out it wasnt

thats probably why im a junior member who apparantly quite good at scripting

[br][size=1]Posted at: 04-09-2006, 11:09:18[/size][hr]iv added a video tutorail, i made it for someone on villu-reborn, so i might as well post it here too

[offtopic]
oh yeah Ron, i finnaly found a use for that “SafeDisguiseScar” thing i made long ago
here it is
[scar]
const yakmandebug=2;
procedure yakdebug(s:string);
begin
case yakmandebug of
0:writeln(s)
1:status(s)
2:safedisguisescar(s)
end
end
[/scar]
its in a script i just made [/offtopic]

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Scripting Utility
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

just wondering, have you been programming scar before you saw this forum? cos those scripts that you made are all, well, pretty much beyond me like the game in scar and other things. and for once i can finally bypass the 40x40 cap. i always wanted a bigger bitmap for those games im making bots on!

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Scripting Utility
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow! Cool script! I hate that 40 by 40 cap they put on the size. It was very annoying. And that color one is great! I can finally see what colors people are talking about.

Read full topic

@yakman wrote:

Try this Utility out. I’v set out to change the way we script!

Features

  1. Displays Bitmaps bigger then 40x40

  2. Integer to Color - Displays Color codes as Colors

  3. Visually represents Radians

  4. Changes Radians to Degrees and vice/versa

No more will you have to wonder when you see “if(getcolor(35,456)=45646)then”

No longer will you ponder on “bmp:=bitmapfromstring(5,65,'sgd…)”
